description:
Nora is a Stray shinki and the main "nora" in the series, which means she has many names. And like any other nora, she`s mostly used for dirty works. and is considered a dirty being from other Deities.
She has many masters since all her body is full of name marks. however only 3 of her masters has been revealed so far. She cares deeply for Yato and constantly tries to get him back to using her again by any means. She also is able to command and shape far shore beings under the curse of a "Mask"
As Rabo`s Shinki, her name is Reiki.
spoiler from non-anime material:
As Yato`s Shinki, her name is Hiiro.
As Ebisu`s Shinki, her name is Tsutsumi.
name: Nora
